item.title: [Pk Planet] New Bank Interface [317]
item.dc:creator: @BoneArmyProductions BoneArmyProductions
item.description:
@BoneArmyProductions wrote:

[quote=“spy man47, post:1, topic:337539”]Ello, I am making this post for the people who downloaded my client, Pk Planet…

If you would like to download Pk Planet, Please take alook at this thread!
Why Would you leech me?
proof: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,433378.0.html

Check Date if you want
This only works for my client! So make sure you are using my client!

Step 1 :

Open Class9.java, and search for

public static void bank(Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub4 aclass30_sub2_sub1_sub4[]) { Class9 class9 = aClass9Array210[5292]; addDPButton(17007, 17007, 17007, 21, 21, "Deposit Inventory"); addDPButton(26008, 26008, 26008, 35, 25, "Deposit Worn Items"); class9.anIntArray240[102] = 17007; class9.anIntArray241[102] = 17; class9.anIntArray272[102] = 25; class9.anIntArray240[103] = 26008; class9.anIntArray241[103] = 55; class9.anIntArray272[103] = 25; }

Delete that!

Now search for

bank(aclass30_sub2_sub1_sub4);

Delete that too!

Step 2 :

Now put these methods anywhere in Class9.java

[code] public static void addSprite2(int i, int j, int k, String s, int l, int i1)
{
Class9 class9 = addInterface(i);
class9.anInt250 = i;
class9.anInt236 = i;
class9.anInt262 = 5;
class9.anInt217 = 0;
class9.anInt214 = 0;
class9.anInt220 = 512;
class9.anInt267 = 334;
class9.aByte254 = 0;
class9.anInt230 = -1;
class9.anIntArray245 = new int[1];
class9.anIntArray212 = new int[1];
class9.anIntArray245[0] = 1;
class9.anIntArray212[0] = l;
class9.anIntArrayArray226 = new int[1][3];
class9.anIntArrayArray226[0][0] = 5;
class9.anIntArrayArray226[0][1] = i1;
class9.anIntArrayArray226[0][2] = 0;
class9.aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1_207 = LoadSprite(j, s);
class9.aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1_260 = LoadSprite(k, s);
}
public static void addBankHover(int i, int j, int k, int l, int i1, String s, int j1, int k1,
int l1, int i2, String s1, int j2, int k2, int l2, String s2,
int i3, String s3, String s4, int j3, int k3)
{
Class9 class9 = addInterface(i);
class9.anInt250 = i;
class9.anInt236 = i;
class9.anInt262 = 5;
class9.anInt217 = j;
class9.anInt214 = 0;
class9.aByte254 = 0;
class9.anInt230 = k;
class9.aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1_207 = LoadSprite(l, s);
class9.aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1_260 = LoadSprite(i1, s);
class9.anInt220 = j1;
class9.aString221 = s1;
class9.anInt267 = k1;
class9.anIntArray245 = new int[1];
class9.anIntArray212 = new int[1];
class9.anIntArray245[0] = 1;
class9.anIntArray212[0] = i2;
class9.anIntArrayArray226 = new int[1][3];
class9.anIntArrayArray226[0][0] = 5;
class9.anIntArrayArray226[0][1] = l1;
class9.anIntArrayArray226[0][2] = 0;
class9 = addInterface(k);
class9.anInt236 = k;
class9.anInt250 = k;
class9.anInt262 = 0;
class9.anInt217 = 0;
class9.anInt220 = 550;
class9.anInt267 = 334;
class9.aBoolean266 = true;
class9.anInt230 = -1;
addSprite2(j2, k2, l2, s2, i2, l1);
addHoverBox(i3, i, s3, s4, i2, l1);
setChildren(2, class9);
setBounds(j2, 15, 60, 0, class9);
setBounds(i3, j3, k3, 1, class9);
}

public static void addBankHover1(int i, int j, int k, int l, String s, int i1, int j1, String s1, 
        int k1, int l1, String s2, int i2, String s3, int j2, int k2)
{
    Class9 class9 = addInterface(i);
    class9.anInt250 = i;
    class9.anInt236 = i;
    class9.anInt262 = 5;
    class9.anInt217 = j;
    class9.anInt214 = 0;
    class9.aByte254 = 0;
    class9.anInt230 = k;
    class9.aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1_207 = LoadSprite(l, s);
    class9.anInt220 = i1;
    class9.aString221 = s1;
    class9.anInt267 = j1;
    class9 = addInterface(k);
    class9.anInt236 = k;
    class9.anInt250 = k;
    class9.anInt262 = 0;
    class9.anInt217 = 0;
    class9.anInt220 = 550;
    class9.anInt267 = 334;
    class9.aBoolean266 = true;
    class9.anInt230 = -1;
    addSprite2(k1, l1, l1, s2, 0, 0);
    addHoverBox(i2, i, s3, s3, 0, 0);
    setChildren(2, class9);
    setBounds(k1, 15, 60, 0, class9);
    setBounds(i2, j2, k2, 1, class9);
}

public static void addHoverBox(int i, int j, String s, String s1, int k, int l)
{
    Class9 class9 = addInterface(i);
    class9.anInt250 = i;
    class9.anInt236 = j;
    class9.anInt262 = 8;
    class9.aString248 = s;
    class9.aString248 = s1;
    class9.anIntArray245 = new int[1];
    class9.anIntArray212 = new int[1];
    class9.anIntArray245[0] = 1;
    class9.anIntArray212[0] = k;
    class9.anIntArrayArray226 = new int[1][3];
    class9.anIntArrayArray226[0][0] = 5;
    class9.anIntArrayArray226[0][1] = l;
    class9.anIntArrayArray226[0][2] = 0;
}

[/code]

Now add the Bank method under the methods that I gave you ^^

public static void Bank() { Class9 Interface = addInterface(5292); setChildren(21, Interface); addSprite(5293, 0, "BANK"); setBounds(5293, 13, 13, 0, Interface); addHover(5384, 3, 0, 5380, 1, "BANK", 17, 17, "Close Window"); addHovered(5380, 2, "BANK", 17, 17, 5379); setBounds(5384, 476, 16, 3, Interface); setBounds(5380, 476, 16, 4, Interface); addHover(5294, 4, 0, 5295, 3, "BANK", 114, 25, "Set A Bank PIN"); addHovered(5295, 4, "BANK", 114, 25, 5296); setBounds(5294, 110, 285, 5, Interface); setBounds(5295, 110, 285, 6, Interface); addBankHover(21000, 4, 21001, 5, 8, "BANK", 35, 25, 304, 1, "Switch to insert items mode", 21002, 7, 6, "BANK", 21003, "Switch to insert items \nmode", "Switch to swap items \nmode.", 12, 20); setBounds(21000, 25, 285, 7, Interface); setBounds(21001, 10, 225, 8, Interface); addBankHover(21004, 4, 21005, 13, 15, "BANK", 35, 25, 0, 1, "Search", 21006, 14, 16, "BANK", 21007, "Click here to search your \nbank", "Click here to search your \nbank", 12, 20); setBounds(21004, 65, 285, 9, Interface); setBounds(21005, 50, 225, 10, Interface); addBankHover1(21008, 5, 21009, 9, "BANK", 35, 25, "Switch to note withdrawal mode", 21010, 10, "BANK", 21015, "Switch to note withdrawal mode", 0, 20); setBounds(21008, 240, 285, 11, Interface); setBounds(21009, 225, 225, 12, Interface); addBankHover1(21012, 5, 21013, 17, "BANK", 35, 25, "Deposit carried items", 21014, 18, "BANK", 21015, "Empty your backpack into\nyour bank", 0, 20); setBounds(21012, 375, 285, 13, Interface); setBounds(21013, 360, 225, 14, Interface); addBankHover1(21016, 5, 21017, 19, "BANK", 35, 25, "Deposit worn items", 21018, 20, "BANK", 21019, "Empty the items your are\nwearing into your bank", 0, 20); setBounds(21016, 415, 285, 15, Interface); setBounds(21017, 400, 225, 16, Interface); addBankHover1(21020, 5, 21021, 21, "BANK", 35, 25, "Deposit beast of burden inventory", 21022, 22, "BANK", 21023, "Empty your BoB's inventory\ninto your bank", 0, 20); setBounds(21020, 455, 285, 17, Interface); setBounds(21021, 440, 225, 18, Interface); addBankHover1(21024, 5, 21025, 23, "BANK", 35, 25, "Switch to item withdrawal mode", 21026, 24, "BANK", 21027, "Switch to item withdrawal mode", 0, 20); setBounds(21024, 280, 285, 19, Interface); setBounds(21025, 265, 225, 20, Interface); setBounds(5383, 170, 15, 1, Interface); setBounds(5385, -4, 74, 2, Interface); Interface = aClass9Array210[5385]; Interface.anInt267 = 206; Interface.anInt220 = 480; Interface = aClass9Array210[5382]; Interface.anInt220 = 10; Interface.anInt231 = 12; Interface.anInt267 = 35; Interface.newScroller = false; }

Search for “aclass44 = class44;”

Under that put

Bank();

Now search for

public static void editShopMain(Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub4 aclass30_sub2_sub1_sub4[])

Replace it all with this :

public static void editShopMain(Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub4 aclass30_sub2_sub1_sub4[]) { Class9 class9 = addInterface(3824); setChildren(10, class9); addSprite(3825, 0, "SHOP"); addHover(3902, 3, 0, 3826, 1, "BANK", 17, 17, "Close Window"); addHovered(3826, 2, "BANK", 17, 17, 3827); addText(19679, "Main Stock", 0xff981f, false, true, 52, aclass30_sub2_sub1_sub4, 1); addText(19680, "", 0xbf751d, false, true, 52, aclass30_sub2_sub1_sub4, 1); addText(21080, "Right-Click on shop to buy an item.", 0xff9933, true, true, 52, aclass30_sub2_sub1_sub4, 1); addText(21099, "Right-Click on inventory to sell an item.", 0xff9933, true, true, 52, aclass30_sub2_sub1_sub4, 1); addButton(19681, 2, "SHOP", 95, 19, "", 1); setBounds(3825, 12, 12, 0, class9); setBounds(3902, 471, 22, 1, class9); setBounds(3826, 471, 22, 2, class9); setBounds(3900, 60, 85, 3, class9); setBounds(3901, 240, 21, 4, class9); setBounds(19679, 42, 54, 5, class9); setBounds(19680, 150, 54, 6, class9); setBounds(19681, 129, 50, 7, class9); setBounds(21080, 255, 270, 8, class9); setBounds(21099, 255, 290, 9, class9); class9 = aClass9Array210[3900]; class9.anInt231 = 8; class9.anInt220 = 10; class9.anInt267 = 4; class9 = addInterface(19682); addSprite(19683, 1, "SHOP"); addText(19684, "Main Stock", 0xbf751d, false, true, 52, aclass30_sub2_sub1_sub4, 1); addText(19685, "", 0xff981f, false, true, 52, aclass30_sub2_sub1_sub4, 1); addButton(19686, 2, "SHOP", 95, 19, "Main Stock", 1); setChildren(7, class9); setBounds(19683, 12, 12, 0, class9); setBounds(3901, 240, 21, 1, class9); setBounds(19684, 42, 54, 2, class9); setBounds(19685, 150, 54, 3, class9); setBounds(19686, 23, 50, 4, class9); setBounds(3902, 471, 22, 5, class9); setBounds(3826, 60, 85, 6, class9); }

[size=10pt]Remember, Sprites goes to Cache>Sprites[/size]

Download Sprites —> Click me!

Picture :

Server Side :

Open Clicking.java and put these anywhere

case 82020: //Deposit Inventory for(int z = 0; z < 101; z++) { for(int t = 0; t < 28; t++) { c.bankItem(z, t, 2147000000); } } break; case 82024: //Deposit worn items for(int r=0; r<c.playerEquipment.length; r++) { { int item2 = c.playerEquipment[r]; if((item2 > 0) && (item2 < 19999)) { c.remove(item2, r); } } } for(int z = 0; z < 101; z++) { for(int t = 0; t < 28; t++) { c.bankItem(z, t, 2147000000); } } break; case 82028: //Deposit Summon items c.sM("This function is coming soon"); break; case 82016: c.takeAsNote = true; break; case 82032: c.takeAsNote = false; break; case 82012: c.sM("This function is comming soon"); break; case 82008: c.sM("This function is comming soon"); break; case 20174: c.showInterface(14924); break;

Credits :

  • 2% BoneArmyProductions (Server side).

  • 98% Tonic (Sprites, Methods).

  • Bashar[/quote]

This isnt exactly like tonic’s
I used his methods cause I couldnt find mine
but the add tap sprite and withdraw as item is mine
and server side is mine too
